#include<bits/stdc++.h>
#define ll long long int
using namespace std;

int main()
{

    int t;
    ll k;

    cin>>t;

    while(t--)
    {

        cin>>k;
        k--;
        ll ans=0;
        ll f=1;
        while(k>0)
        {
            ans+=(k%5)*(f);
            f=f*10;
            k/=5;
        }
        cout<<(ans*2)<<endl;
    }

    return 0;

}
